db:abstract.db:para: Provides parameters that describe a mouse event.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Mouse events occur when a mouse button is pressed and the ray traversing the view, originating from the mouse position intersects with one or more elements of the scene.

db:section.db:title: accepted : bool
db:section.db:para: Specifies if the mouse event has been accepted

db:section.db:title: [read-only] button : Buttons
db:section.db:para: Specifies the button triggering the mouse event

db:section.db:title: [read-only] buttons : int
db:section.db:para: Specifies the button triggering the mouse event

db:section.db:title: [read-only] modifiers : Modifiers
db:section.db:para: Specifies if any modifiers were applied to the mouse event

db:section.db:title: [read-only] wasHeld : bool
db:section.db:para: Specifies if a mouse button was held down during the mouse event

db:section.db:title: [read-only] x : int
db:section.db:para: Specifies The X coordinate of the mouse event

db:section.db:title: [read-only] y : int
db:section.db:para: Specifies The Y coordinate of the mouse event
